name: GREY MATTER (ArbiterGames)
description:
Title: GREY MATTER

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

The game is a gray box.

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to move around. Use the mouse to look around. Use spacebar to jump

Game Design Team

FATIH OKAN – Game Designer
